citations.narrative:
Three dogs had matted hair upon inspection. A female Pomeranian (Trixie #3313) had mats along her back and a few
smaller mats in the groin area. The mats on the back were not tight, and the skin did not appear irritated. A male
Pomeranian (#3797) had mats on the right shoulder, the tail, and behind the right ear. A Pomeranian (Fiesty #8862) had
matted clumps of hair behind both ears. Matted hair can cause skin irritation or may be an indication of an underlying skin
or ear issue. A regular grooming schedule should be part of a preventative care program to ensure healthy and unmatted
hair coats. Corrected at the time of the inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(4)  Repeat
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
Three dogs had matted hair upon inspection. A female Pomeranian (Trixie #3313) had mats along her back and a few 
smaller mats in the groin area. The mats on the back were not tight, and the skin did not appear irritated. A male 
Pomeranian (#3797) had mats on the right shoulder, the tail, and behind the right ear. A Pomeranian (Fiesty #8862) had 
matted clumps of hair behind both ears. Matted hair can cause skin irritation or may be an indication of an underlying skin 
or ear issue. A regular grooming schedule should be part of a preventative care program to ensure healthy and unmatted 
hair coats. Corrected at the time of the inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
